sentence: I read some reviews about the rooms being tired and in need of refurbishment but this was definitely not the case for our room 115
my room was located in the wing which is not renovated yet and the bed is not that comfortable and the tower rooms all renovated but were full
I am not sure if it is had a refit since Ritz took the property over and is starting to show some signs that it could benefit from some renovations imo
The beds need updating

With a full refurbishment of the hotel including rooms corridors and common areas as well as staff training to match the standards of other Ritz Carlton hotels worldwide the Al Bustan Palace could once again become a jewel within Oman and the Middle East
Compared to a previous visit in January 2016 the hot and quiet season clearly has a negative effect on the upkeep and service
but it IS undergoing renovations so should look more modern fresh sometime soon
If I had to find fault I would say the rooms are a bit dated but they are currently refurbishing them so am sure they will be lovely when they are done
A little noisy at moments of the day as works have started for refurbishment works
Room hotel old in need of upcoming renovation
excellent service with New renovation excellent private beach
The renovation of the hotel has revealed a masterclas in architecture picturesque
Updated Ritz gets 5 stars
Rooms have all recently been redone so very clean and modern
The hotel has recently been renovated and smells lovely
The recently renovated rooms are beautifully furnished and decorated
Amazing one day get away you l be relaxed and refreshed and energized with refreshing tree shaded pool and a magnificent sandy beach for a most affordable rate
Excellent service amazing property newly renovated rooms truly Ritz Carlton quality
Overall a fantastic stay at a beautiful hotel with wonderful service2 restaurants were under renovation so did not leave a lot of choice
